title: Takiwaza
author: Takiwaza
content: Hello Community !!I am so Glad to be part of this Forum & Looking forward to make a lot of friends.  I am a fan of K8 casino if you heard it before, so i am just here to share their Great Bonuses and Promos with lots of Surprises & Prizes. I am generous , so i would share to all of you the link where i am always playing.  https://k8.io/promotions/Daily-Wins-Slots-Live-CasinoThis Event Start this April until May 29,2023 .... See you there !!Daily Wins Slots Terms & ConditionsTop 1500 players with the highest scores on the weekly leaderboard will win prizes worth a total of $15,000 USD;The Tournament winners are based on Highest Total of all Bets;Scores = Total Bet converted to USD *100;The Tournament will run weekly from Monday to Monday between 24 April 2023 18:00 to 29 May 2023 17:59 (UTC+8). There are 5 Tournaments during promotion period;No minimum bet is required for this promotion;Qualified Games: All Pragmatic Play games except Money Roll, Irish Charms, 888 Gold, Diamonds are Forever 3 lines, Table Games, Video Poker and Scratch Cards;If there are two or more players with identical score in tournament leaderboard, the player who scores it first will get the higher position on the leader board;The tournament leaderboard is built in the qualifying games and updates in real time;Tournament prizes will be credited to winners within 48 hours after the promo ended.​Daily Wins Live Casino Terms & Conditions2000 cash prizes worth a total of $20,000 USD to be won each week;Cash Drops will run weekly from Monday to Monday between 27 March 2023 18:00 to 10 April 2023 17:59 (UTC+8);Min bet to participate is $0.5;One (1) qualifying bet may trigger one (1) prize from the prize pool and a player may win multiple Cash Drops;Rules and prize tables are built in the participating games/tables and updates in real time;Cash Drops will be available for all live casino games;Tournament prizes will be credited to winners within 48 hours after the promo ended.
